items.sentence: I hope that you know that the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.
I hope you know that the last thing that I want to do is go there without your permission.
You could tell Tom was unconscious as he fell because he made no effort to break his fall.
Even though Tom was brought up in the country, he loves the hustle and bustle of the city.
Leftover chicken can be stored in the fridge in a sealed container for three or four days.
